ygData.subject: Re: Logo or Kinger first come first serve.
ygData.msgSnippet: KitKats offer sounded to good to be true, he comes into her base, steals genetic material, damages her home and she lets him walk out? There was something

KitKats offer sounded to good to be true, he comes into her base, 
steals genetic material, damages her home and she lets him walk out? 
There was something about KitKat that he didn't trust. He had to 
admit that for a Predacon "B" um I mean Witch she was atractive. He 
just didn't want to be fooled by another pretty face. "You want to 
know why I broke in here? I don't even know that, It's my function, 
It's what I do." he knew that Name Function and online date were the 
three things a POW could offer. "Now what makes me so special that 
you'd go so far out of your way to track me down just to let me go 
again?" He wasn't used to the offer she was making him. He wanted to 
go free but he wanted to know why she was being such a nice puppy.

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She sighed, "Because I gave you my word. I am also curious as to 
why 
> you broke in here. I have no reason to let you live. But I gave you 
> my word that I would not harm you. And I swore that no harm would 
> come to you."
> 
> She no longer really wanted this bot. For anything. She only wanted 
> him to leave. She didn't see him as a threat. If anything, she 
hoped 
> that she might gain him as an ally.
> 
> "You intrieg me Fox. You came here, stole stuff from my lab. You 
> obviously had a reason, and I wish to know that reason. I will not 
> harm you. Once you have ansered my questions," she looked down, 
> knowing she would live to regret this,"I will let you go. No harm, 
no 
> fight. Just answer my questions and you are free. You have my word, 
> my honor."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Foxfingers transformed back to bot mode and stayed crouched 
behind 
> > the engines. He pulled out a detonator knowing that a Preds 
> greatest 
> > weakness was self preservation. "I have a detonator over here, 
> whats 
> > to keep me from blowing this whole place to little pieces?" he 
held 
> > it out in the open for her to see. He wasn't lieing, he had a 
> > detonator, he just didn't have the explosives to back it up. It 
was 
> a 
> > gamble but he was quickly running out of options. His bag of 
tricks 
> > was running low too. 
> > 
> > KitKat wanted him alive he wanted to know why. "Whats so 
important 
> > about me that you'd let me live?" he asked directly. There was no 
> > longer any avoiding the issues there were only questions and 
> answers.
> >
